function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Concentration of vbd-related deaths in sub-saharan africa","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Short lifespan of study in a quickly evolving social media ecosystem","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccuracy of information on wearing masks in coronavirus prevention articles","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential bias introduced by the use of buzzsumo in the study","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of false information about covid-19 prevention measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Excessive reliance on non-affiliated and non-peer reviewed sources","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disproportionate sharing of inaccurate information on social media platforms","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Comparison of accurate and misleading articles using chi-square test","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on inaccurate information from social media","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of preventive advice in shared articles","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of relevant prevention information due to keyword selection","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Public perception shift towards the importance of urban green spaces","category":"Living","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Usage of green spaces located in the city centre indicates willingness to cover larger distances, leading to increased movement and potential spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Living","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting an online survey may lead to a biased sample composition, potentially skewing the data analysis and conclusions.","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Preference for online questionnaires among younger respondents may result in overrepresentation of this age group in the survey data, leading to age bias in the analysis and conclusions.","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on gis and big data technologies for covid-19 response","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survey data collection lacking identifying information","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Broad promotion of the survey","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Encouraging the use of private channels for survey participation","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of online surveys for data collection","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Phases of pandemic and government actions","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Public behavioral responses to covid-19 and previous outbreaks of infectious diseases","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of attention to official governmental media","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-representative online survey sample","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on official governmental media as the primary source of information","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Trust in the source of information as a predictor of protective behaviors","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dissemination of outdated or wrong health information through social media","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High risk perception not always associated with high preparedness for natural disasters","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited explanation of the level of protective behaviors by knowledge alone","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential response bias in study participants","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Influence of official advice on protective behaviors","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Measuring public attention and trust in official media related to covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of social and cultural perspectives on risk perception","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of understanding as a major obstacle to public compliance with emergency response measures","category":"Health"},{"name":"Bias in data collection due to online survey","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete questionnaire submissions","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Travel restrictions and social distancing impacting availability of inspectors and delivery staff","category":"Transport","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shutting down of floor trading impacting commodity exchange","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enforced border shutdowns, travel restrictions, and quarantine","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data on sars-cov-2 prevalence and persistence in wastewater, hindering informed risk management actions for the wastewater sector.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for inaccurate detection of sars-cov-2 re-emergence or presence/absence through wastewater monitoring.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of widely-accepted surveillance system for detecting the potential community presence of covid-19 through wastewater monitoring.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of wastewater \n’analysis’ for monitoring covid-19 incidence","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited sharing of patient data between health authorities and waste services sector","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to follow additional protective measures such as wearing masks, gloves, and practicing physical distancing","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Debate regarding transmission of small airborne aerosols through ventilation systems","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Debate about the effectiveness of ventilation in reducing the transmission of sars-cov-2","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent understanding of the role of aerosol airborne transmission in the spread of sars-cov-2","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential negligence in addressing airborne transmission risks due to conflicting expert opinions","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Occupants not feeling comfortable or feeling ill in the building","category":"Health","confidence":"High"}]}
